function calcWinner(row,col,player,board,size){var count=1;// ROW WIN
for(var i=1;i<size;i++){if(board[row]&&board[row][col-i]==player)count++;if(board[row]&&board[row][col+i]==player)count++;}if(count===size)return true;else count=1;// COLUMN WIN

for(var _i3=1;_i3<size;_i3++){if(board[row-_i3]&&board[row-_i3][col+_i3]==player)count++;if(board[row+_i3]&&board[row+_i3][col-_i3]==player)count++;}if(count===size)return true;else return false;}function tieGame(board){var flattenBoard=[].concat.apply([],board);return!flattenBoard.includes(null);}// ----------------- VARIABLE ----------------- //
